questions.question: What are the eligibility criteria for admission?
questions.response: The eligibility criteria for admission include a minimum of 60% marks in 12th grade with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics) for the CSE program.

questions.question: What is the admission process?
questions.response: The admission process includes filling out an online application, appearing for an entrance exam, and attending a counseling session.

questions.question: What are the available specializations in CSE?
questions.response: Our CSE department offers specializations in AI & ML, Cybersecurity, Data Science, and Cloud Computing.

questions.question: What is the tuition fee for the CSE program?
questions.response: The tuition fee for the CSE program is approximately â‚¹1,50,000 per year.

questions.question: Are there any scholarships available?
questions.response: Yes, we offer merit-based scholarships for students scoring above 90% in their 12th-grade exams and need-based financial aid.

questions.question: What is the placement record of the CSE department?
questions.response: Our CSE department has a placement rate of 95%, with top recruiters like Google, Microsoft, and Amazon.

questions.question: What entrance exams are accepted?
questions.response: We accept JEE Main, CET, and our university's own entrance test.

questions.question: What is the duration of the CSE program?
questions.response: The Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in CSE is a 4-year program.

questions.question: Is hostel accommodation available?
questions.response: Yes, hostel accommodation is available for both boys and girls, with modern facilities and WiFi.

questions.question: Who can I contact for more admission details?
questions.response: You can contact our admission office at admissions@university.edu or call +91-9876543210.

questions.question: What is the college name?
questions.response: Velalar College of Engineering and Technology
